alanMistakes: Alan akoki kosala mabunga. Salelá mayele na yo ya bonganga. 7/25
name: Kombo
passwordTitle: Tyá mot de passe ya Alan
passwordErrorMsg: Mot de passe ezali malamu te. Meka lisusu
noCodeLine: Kode ezali te to ebungi? Sanganá na biso awa
eyeMarqueeLine2: Naboni namonaka disiki ya liso (optic disc) na Arclight?
eyeMarqueeLine3: Mobali 25, liso motema mikolo 3, alingaka pole te, misisa ekitá mwa moke
eyeMarqueeLine4: Loba na ngai likambo ya Iritis
eyeMarqueeLine5: Esengeli natindela moto oyo azali na cataract ya bokilo mbangu?
eyeMarqueeLine6: Mwasi 65, komona mabe, azali na lunete te. Liboso ya liso ezali malamu, pupil ebɛlɛ
eyeMarqueeLine7: Mama azali kobanga, mwana azali na zenitho ya pembe, azali te komona na liso yango.
earMarqueeLine2: Nakoki komona membrane tympanic na Arclight na ngai?
earMarqueeLine3: Mobali 16, pinna ebɛti mpasi mikolo 2, ezo kosokola, koyoka malamu
earMarqueeLine4: Lobela ngai likambo ya kosukola litoyi (syringing)
earMarqueeLine5: Esengeli natindela moto oyo azali na mastoiditis mbangu?
earMarqueeLine6: Mobali 73, koyoka eza mabe. Monoko ya litoyi emonanaka malamu te, namoni kaka cérumen
earMarqueeLine7: Mwana moke ayokaka te mongongo. Ekomi bileko mingi
geoInfoText: Na kokliká "Lokasyon", esika ya solo (lat/long) ekobimisama malamu. Likambo wana ekosalisa na kopesa mayele mpe ba chwa ya malamu.
frontOfEyeText:
Tala mpe kopɛtola misu: nyoso liboso, ya mobali, ya mwasi, likolo, nse
Kangá mpe bondelela pene. Tala: mpepo, conjunctiva, cornea, pupil
Salela fluoresceïne mpo na maladi ya cornea
fundalReflexText:
Na ndako ya moindo, mwana azali na kimia; na ntango ya bras – kompara reflex
Ya likele: Kitoko, Loko, Forma
Kende pene mpo na mayele: Leso, cataract, RB, Vit Haem
backOfEyeText:
Salela liso ya mobali mpo na komona liso ya mobali; ya mwasi mpo na liso ya mwasi
Moteyi asengeli kotala liboso, te na mwanga; luka optic disc (Dilate = komona polele)
Sala étude ya disc: Margin, Loko, Kop. Landá mabwaku minene, sima senga moteyi atala polele na mwanga mpo na komona macula
additionalText_eye:
Yeba disko na yo: normal, ekoki kokamwa, bilamba ya sika, ekweli, mbeya
>Zala na pratique mingi<
pageTitle_howToExamineEar: Ndenge ya kotala ntɔ́ngɔ ya ntɛ́
allAroundEarText:
Tala: pinna, tragus, mastoid mpo na biloko, ntina to mbulamatata
Zwa pinna na bolamu, landa soki ezali na mawa
earCanalText:
Poná mutu, kamata Arclight lokola patano
Hela pinna epai ya likoló/mokolo (bato minene) to epai ya na mabe (bana)
Kotika spéculum (4.5 mm bato minene, 2.5 mm bana), pusá koleka manzaka, zongisa soki esengeli
Luka: wax, bilamba, mpasi
tympanicMembraneText:
Tala handle ya malleus, rayon ya mwanga, attic
Talela: lokota, esika, transparence
Luka perforation, mayi to mbula
additionalText_ear:
Yeba TM na yo: normal, motuya, ekokamwa, ekopesi, ekotambwama
>Zala na pratique mingi<
generalObservationText:
Tala biloko ya mikuta, mpayi ya lokota, bipai na yango
Fina polele mpo na texture, molunge to mawa
uvLightText:
Na ndako ya molili tala fluorescence ya biloko:
tinea (bluu-ya-mokili), pityriasis versicolor (orange ya shaba), erythrasma (rouge ya korali), vitiligo (bluu-myeupe), acne (orange-rouge), head-lice nits (bluu-pɛlɛ)
dermoscopyText:
Kamata Arclight polariser lokola patano, tala: ABCDE (Asymétrie, Limite, Lokota, Diamètre > 6 mm, Evolue)
Tala lisusu: PDSBV (Réseau ya pigment, Point, Ligne, Bluu-myeupe, Vascular)
additionalText_skin:
Yeba lesion na yo: normal, mosakoli, ekuveta
>Zala na pratique mingi<
aboutAlanText:
Alan ezali motambwisi ya mayele ya AI ya kotala misu, matoyi mpe nzoto, asangí modèle ya lokota ya liboso mpe logique symbolique. Émonene, sérieux, ya etape ya sika.

Mayele ya clinique, ya mboka mpe bililingi esalemaka mpo na basali ya bokolongono mpe ba généralistes. Dialogue ya mokuse epesaka diagnosis mpe plan ya misala. Kosalela Arclight ezali na kati ya nyonso.
aboutAlanListItem1: Base ya ba experts – climat tropikal/ya molunge
instructionsIntro: Alan ezali motambwisi ya AI mpo na ba étudiant mpe bato oyo batalaka misu, matoyi to nzoto mbala moke. Andika to loba polele, wana te komonisa kombo to ba détails ya moto. Tala penza loketo ya motoba mpe talela miso/matoyi mibale. Bolamu!
instructionsPatientPrompt: Loba na Alan makambo ya patient na yo :
instructionsUseArclight_default: Salela Arclight: liboso, reflet fundal, nsima ya misu.
instructionsUseArclight_eye: Salela Arclight: liboso, reflet fundal, nsima ya misu.
instructionsJustRight_eye: Mobali 25 mbula, misu ya motema mikolo 3. Ezanga lisusu problème ya misu. Mpasi, mayi, point na cornea. Pupil malamu, misisa 6/12 na 6/6 mosusu.
instructionsTooMuch_eye: Mobali oyo ayei lelo na clinique. Ateki motuka na ye na kati ya bâtiment, misu na ye motema; alobi biloko alyaki esali misu mabe. Namoni mayi mpe bɔrd motema. Asengi lisungi – mobali molayi, misu mayi, mpasi na cornea. Alobi : "Nini oyo?"
instructionsAdditionalQuery_eye: Alan azongisela mpe mituna ya koyekola misu : Nini Iritis? Ndenge nini komona retina?
instructionsJustRight_ear: Mobali 25 mbula, matoyi ya motema mikolo 3. Ezanga lisusu problème ya matoyi. Mpasi, mayi. Membrane motema, koyoka ekitá na matoyi mabe kasi malamu na mosusu.
instructionsTooMuch_ear: Mobali oyo ayei lelo na clinique. Ateki motuka na ye, matoyi motema; alobi biloko alyaki esali matoyi mabe. Namoni mayi mpe bɔrd motema. Asengi lisungi – mobali molayi, matoyi mayi, mpasi. Alobi : "Nini oyo?"
instructionsAdditionalQuery_ear: Alan azongisela mpe mituna ya koyekola matoyi : Nini Otitis Media? Ndenge nini kosukola matoyi?
instructionsJustRight_skin: Mobali 25 mbula, patch ya nzoto motema mikolo 3. Ezanga lisusu problème ya nzoto. Nzoto epesi mawa mpe eloka.
instructionsTooMuch_skin: Mobali oyo ayei na clinique. Abimi na bâtiment, nzoto motema; alobi biloko alyaki esali nzoto mabe. Namoni mayi mpe bɔrd motema. Asengi lisungi – mobali molayi, nzoto motema, mpasi na pigment. Alobi : "Nini oyo?"
instructionsAdditionalQuery_skin: Alan azongisela mpe mituna ya koyekola nzoto : Nini Eczema? Ndenge nini komona réseau ya pigment?
instructionText: Alan ezali motambwisi ya AI mpo na ba étudiant mpe bato oyo batalaka misu, matoyi to nzoto mbala moke. Andika to loba polele, kosala te identifikasio ya moto.
